title: Projectile motion - longer time and greater speed

content.description: Which of the following correctly predicts which ball is in the air longer, and which ball has a greater speed at the maximum height?
content.question: Longer Time in Air Greater Speed at Highest Point A Ball <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi> </math> Ball <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> B Ball <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> Both Equal C Ball <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> Ball <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> D Ball <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> Both Equal

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
